---
title: "Life Expectancy and Population"
---

This page analyzes the relationship between life expectancy and population size across countries.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

fig = px.scatter(
    df,
    x="population_millions",
    y="life_expectancy",
    color="continent",
    hover_name="country",
    animation_frame="year",
    animation_group="country",
    size="gdp_per_capita",
    labels={
        "population_millions": "Population (millions)",
        "life_expectancy": "Life Expectancy",
        "gdp_per_capita": "GDP per Capita"
    },
    title="Life Expectancy vs Population Over Time"
)
fig.show()
